mapper.select: select o.o_id, l.l_xcordinate, l.l_ycordinate from location l inner join offering o on l.l_code = o.l_code inner join offering_detail od on o.o_id = od.o_id where od.od_room_kind = #{room_kind}

select od.o_id, od_room_kind, od_private_area, od_apply_floor, od_occupy_date, ok_code, ok_deposit, ok_month_of_payment, od_short_lease, image_1 from offering_detail od inner join offering_kind ok on od.o_id = ok.o_id inner join image i on od.o_id = i.o_id where od.od_room_kind = #{room_kind}

select offering.o_id, l_xcordinate, l_ycordinate, ok_code, ok_deposit, ok_maintenance_cost, ok_month_of_payment, od_short_lease, od_occupy_date from offering, location, offering_kind, offering_detail where offering.l_code = location.l_code AND offering.o_id = offering_kind.o_id AND offering.o_id = offering_detail.o_id order by dbms_random.random
